dublin_core.dcvalue: To encourage case managers and CM employers to support compliance with multistate nursing licensure the Case Management Society of America CMSA board of directors has revised an earlier position statement on multistate nursing licensure in case management According to CMSA President Susan Rogers RN BSN CCM CMSA s fundamental position on this topic remains unchanged What s different is a more assertive position in support of appropriate safeguards for our members and case managers nationwide
Multistate nurse licensure in case management.
